metadata.feature_description: Manages predefined layout templates that users can apply to quickly configure column layouts.

steps.action: Navigate to page in Edit Mode and locate ContentLayout module
steps.expected: ContentLayout module should be visible with column panes
steps.actual: ContentLayout module ctr364 found with F30A_Pane1 and F30A_Pane2 columns

steps.action: Call GetContentLayoutTemplates API to load available templates
steps.expected: API should return list of available layout templates
steps.actual: API returned 6 layout templates with correct structure (Id, Name, Sizes, Icon)

steps.action: Verify initial column sizes before applying template
steps.expected: Current column sizes should be visible
steps.actual: Column sizes were 60%/40% (col-lg-7/col-lg-5) before template application
Template successfully applied - columns changed to 75%/25% (col-lg-9/col-lg-3)

steps.action: Verify column sizes after template application
steps.actual: Size indicators show 75% and 25% for the two columns, confirming template was applied

steps.expected: Templates should be cached to improve performance
steps.actual: Code uses CBO.GetCachedObject with LayoutTemplateCacheKey and 20-minute cache timeout (CacheTimeout = 20)

steps.action: Verify templates load consistently on multiple API calls
steps.expected: Templates should load from cache on subsequent requests
steps.actual: API calls returned same 6 templates consistently, indicating cache is functioning

steps.expected: XML file should contain valid LayoutTemplate elements
steps.actual: data.xml contains ArrayOfLayoutTemplate with 6 LayoutTemplate elements, each with Id, Name, Icon, and Sizes attributes

steps.action: Verify API returns properly deserialized template objects
steps.expected: Templates should have correct Id, Name, Sizes, and Icon properties
steps.actual: API returned templates with proper structure: Id (1-6), Name (e.g., '75% + 25%'), Sizes (e.g., '75'), Icon paths

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify all default templates are available

steps.action: Call GetContentLayoutTemplates API and count templates
steps.expected: All 6 default templates should be available
steps.actual: API returned exactly 6 templates matching data.xml definitions
All 6 templates verified: Template 1 (25%+75%), Template 2 (75%+25%), Template 3 (50%+50%), Template 4 (25%+50%+25%), Template 5 (33%+33%+33%), Template 6 (4x25%)

observations: Template selector UI is not visible in the module settings dialog - templates are managed programmatically via API calls (UpdateLayoutFromTemplate endpoint)
Column size indicators (75%, 25%, etc.) appear on hover over the resize handles between columns
Resize handles exist as jQuery UI resizable elements on each column pane
The LayoutTemplateController uses a 20-minute cache (CBO.GetCachedObject) for template data to optimize performance
Templates are stored in data.xml and deserialized using XmlUtils.Deserialize into LayoutTemplate DTOs
